sentences: Ta pole pärast lahutust oma eksi kordagi näinud.
Ma ei ole kordagi olnud selles linnas.
Kordagi ei mõelnud ta sellest üle.
context: The word 'kordagi' is an Estonian adverb that means 'never' or 'at no time'. It's used to indicate that something has never happened, not at any point in time. In the example sentence given in the dictionary definition, it modifies the verb näinud (seen) to emphasize that the person has never seen their ex-spouse after the divorce.
